```py
>>> lst = ['a', 'a', 'b', 'b']
>>> ser = pd.Series([1, 2, 3, 4], index=lst)
>>> ser
a    1
a    2
b    3
b    4
dtype: int64
>>> ser.groupby(level=0).shift(1)
a    NaN
a    1.0
b    NaN
b    3.0
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> data = [[1, 2, 3], [1, 5, 6], [2, 5, 8], [2, 6, 9]]
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["a", "b", "c"],
...                   index=["tuna", "salmon", "catfish", "goldfish"])
>>> df
 a  b  c
 tuna   1  2  3
 salmon   1  5  6
 catfish   2  5  8
goldfish   2  6  9
>>> df.groupby("a").shift(1)
 b    c
 tuna    NaN  NaN
 salmon    2.0  3.0
 catfish    NaN  NaN
goldfish    5.0  8.0 
```
